	Matt,

	 

	Can you confirm that this is the pole you want to attach to?

	 

	 

	 

	 

	 



Toby Rasmussen

Manager Region Operations

Outstate Oregon

Phone: 509-222-8018

tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com  

	 

	 

	 

	 

	From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Thursday, May 15, 2025 11:21 AM
	To: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >
	Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: Fw: Flock camera

	 

	Hi Tobin, If you could provide it to us so that we are the same page that would be great. I have added my colleague Matt Yang to these emails. He deals in Permitting/Permissions here at Flock. To confirm, as long as we follow the soon to be

	

	Hi Tobin,

	 

	If you could provide it to us so that we are the same page that would be great. I have added my colleague Matt Yang to these emails. He deals in Permitting/Permissions here at Flock.

	 

	To confirm, as long as we follow the soon to be provided standards we are good to proceed with installing on this pole? Once we have your permission we can get the install process moving and then let you know when we have a date.

	
 https://urldefense.com/v3/__http:/flocksafety.com?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp__;!!CdLFVIQ!VIZVuIkH3vaetU4JglkNEzhAEfJs-BqAfPTcuN4bXDwOr4PZv_wI5WXGUoUZk_0GfWrhQAamyszrJsstd42SIchuMXYH$

	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/QNRBjXxDy31.png> 

	 

	 

	On Thu, May 15, 2025 at 11:17?AM Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com > wrote:

		Thanks for the pictures, Matt.

		 

		Let me know when you are looking to deploy/install the cameras.  We just need to make sure to follow NESC standards for pole attachments.  Of particular importance is proper bonding and grounding from a safety perspective.

		 

		If you are unfamiliar with the NESC standards, we can help.

		 

		 

		 



Toby Rasmussen

Manager Region Operations

Outstate Oregon

Phone: 509-222-8018

tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com  

		 

		 

		 

		 

		From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
		Sent: Thursday, May 15, 2025 5:55 AM
		To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >
		Cc: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: Re: Fw: Flock camera

		 

		Hi Toby, Happy Thursday to you. Attached are a couple photos from a recent installation on an existing pole. What are you seeing is the same type of camera on solar panel that we are proposing to mount on this pole in order to meet the coverage

		Hi Toby,

		 

		Happy Thursday to you. Attached are a couple photos from a recent installation on an existing pole. What are you seeing is the same type of camera on solar panel that we are proposing to mount on this pole in order to meet the coverage that Eugene PD is looking for.

		 

		Please let me know if you have any other questions or if we are approved to mount, what kind of heads up you need or additional product info you need.

		 

		Regards

	
 https://urldefense.com/v3/__http:/flocksafety.com?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp__;!!CdLFVIQ!WKK-ejwO1pHzdpoI_GXeCaci3sbwOmHGtW91bpWAjkjmkWfKZaNJixqEByqE0nJ0QYL9ch2IYHqB8ZMK3iZ1nkeqNSIR$ 

Matt Triana
Project Manager

		On Wed, May 14, 2025 at 2:18?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

			Here is the official approval and what they need.

			 

			Derek

			 

			Detective D. DeWitt

			Financial Crimes Unit

			Special Weapons and Tactics Team

			Eugene Police Department

			300 County Club Road

			Eugene, OR 97401

			Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

			Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

			Work Celll � 541-743-6192

________________________________

			From: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >
			Sent: Wednesday, May 14, 2025 2:16:36 PM
			To: JOHNS Aaron R <AJohns@eugene-or.gov AJohns@eugene-or.gov >
			Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
			Subject: RE: Flock camera 

			 

			[EXTERNAL ?]

			Aaron,

			 

			I can confirm that those poles in that area are Lumen owned.  I approve installation of camera(s) on the pole and in very much in favor of this.  

			 

			That being said, we do need to make sure we are in compliance with NESC standards.  (i.e. unobstructed climbing space, and because this pole has power attached the camera needs to be properly bonded and grounded to the poles ground wire etc.)  I am sure Flock is aware of these things and has experience with it.

			 

			I would like to see an example of a camera installed on a pole if you have any photo examples or can point me toward a current installation site?

			 

			 

			 



Toby Rasmussen

Manager Region Operations

Outstate Oregon

Phone: 509-222-8018

tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com  

			 

			 

			 

			 

			From: JOHNS Aaron R <AJohns@eugene-or.gov AJohns@eugene-or.gov > 
			Sent: Wednesday, May 14, 2025 12:22 PM
			To: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >
			Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
			Subject: Flock camera

			 

			Toby, I am writing this email to confirm we can get a Flock camera attached to the Lumen pole located between 3045 Royal Ave and 3115 Royal Ave. I believe these Flock cameras can be a great asset in catching wire thieves. Ensurity is also making

			Toby,

			I am writing this email to confirm we can get a Flock camera attached to the Lumen pole located between 3045 Royal Ave and 3115 Royal Ave.  I believe these Flock cameras can be a great asset in catching wire thieves.  Ensurity is also making a program that will work directly with Flock�s cameras.  Flock cameras will be able to track the GPS signal from Ensurity�s trackers and capture digital images as the trackers move around the area of the Flock cameras.  

			 

			Sincerely, 

			 

			Aaron Johns

			Detective

			Property Crimes Unit 

			Eugene Police Department 

			300 Country Club Rd

			Eugene OR 97401

			Ph 541-682-5843

			Fax 541-682-6603

thread_messages.subject: RE: Flock camera
thread_messages.body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

			Aaron,

			 

			I can confirm that those poles in that area are Lumen owned.  I approve installation of camera(s) on the pole and in very much in favor of this.  

			 

			That being said, we do need to make sure we are in compliance with NESC standards.  (i.e. unobstructed climbing space, and because this pole has power attached the camera needs to be properly bonded and grounded to the poles ground wire etc.)  I am sure Flock is aware of these things and has experience with it.

			 

			I would like to see an example of a camera installed on a pole if you have any photo examples or can point me toward a current installation site?

			 

			 

			 



Toby Rasmussen

Manager Region Operations

Outstate Oregon

Phone: 509-222-8018

tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com

			Toby,

			I am writing this email to confirm we can get a Flock camera attached to the Lumen pole located between 3045 Royal Ave and 3115 Royal Ave.  I believe these Flock cameras can be a great asset in catching wire thieves.  Ensurity is also making a program that will work directly with Flock�s cameras.  Flock cameras will be able to track the GPS signal from Ensurity�s trackers and capture digital images as the trackers move around the area of the Flock cameras.  

			 

			Sincerely, 

			 

			Aaron Johns

			Detective

			Property Crimes Unit 

			Eugene Police Department 

			300 Country Club Rd

			Eugene OR 97401
